title: Is Peter Thiel's book Zero to One one of the best books for entrepreneurs and Silicon Valley people to read? - Quora

response.answer_text: I just read this 2 years after starting my company and found it insightful and useful. There’s some good tips about setting the right foundations when starting a company and about sales. He draws on his experience and intellect to argue the case for setting ambitious goals in the right way. A few parts seemed to be somewhat post-rationalized but it doesn’t really matter. It’s worth reading if you’re interested in business.

Zero to One is one of the best business books . This book gave you an insight of how an business works, It also enhance your knowledge about finance and what is the difference between successful and unsuccessful business . I am about to complete the book second time. Zero to One does not offer a formula for success , it’s just a exercise for your thinking If you want a detailed review and insight about this book ,You can watch my video on that :
